thread.title: Guy Fieri was lurking in the crowd at All-Star Saturday night
thread.title_full: Guy Fieri was lurking in the crowd at All-Star Saturday night

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Guy Fieri was lurking in the crowd at All-Star Saturday night
text:
And having the time of his life.
By now the festivities of All-Star Saturday night have begun. Prior to the skills challenge DNCE, Joe Jonas’ new band, played. It was a little bit lackluster on TV, but the crowd seemed to really enjoy it, particularly one special guest.
Oh hell yeah, our man Guy Fieri loves DNCE and he is HERE for All Star Weekend. 
More like Diners, Drive-Ins and Dunks amirite? (I can’t take credit for that, my co-worker Eric came up with it.)
This GIF is like your dad after 2 and a half beers at the local 4th of July amphitheater concert.
Rock on Guy. Enjoy your weekend.
